0.user_question: Mary is baking a cake. The recipe calls for 11 cups of sugar and some more cups of flour. She already put in 3 cups of flour. If she still needs to add 6 more cups of flour How many cups of flour did the recipe require?

ost_step.2: She still needs to add 6 more cups of flour.
